cause.description:
We're all noticing the changes in the climate all around the globe. Hurricanes like never before, flowds, increase in temperature, etc.
Watch the DVD "The inconvenient truth" and you will be astoneshed by the clarity of the situation and especially its emergency.
We can't continue acting in denial, neither in despair. The solutions are here, and the consequences are extremely concrete.
Check the website to know what you can do at your own level. Act so your children (we're not even talking about your grandchildren here!) and you can continue to live on planet earth. Its our only home, and its dying.
http://climatecrisis.org/ http://www.climatecrisis.net/pdf/10things.pdf
1. Consequences of climate crisis is an emergency
2. Solutions are available and the results can be extremely effective
3. Each human being can help reduce CO2
cause.name: Climate crisis. Its dead serious
